code: import{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./styles/App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const navigate=useNavigate();const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');function navRegister(){navigate('/register');}async function loginUser(event){event.preventDefault();const response=await fetch('http://localhost:1337/api/login',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({email,password})});const data=await response.json();if(data.user){localStorage.setItem('token',data.user);alert('login succesfull');window.location.href='/dashbord';}else{alert('please check your username and password');}}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{class:"form-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{class:"rectangle"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:loginUser,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),type:"email",placeholder:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),type:"password",placeholder:"Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"submit",value:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:navRegister,children:"Register"})]})]});}export default App;
